main_b_par_1: We use scientific methods and technologies, legal legislation and regulations as required to sustain and develop our fundamental principles. As Erşah Construction, our quality policy is to provide the best service focused on employer and customer satisfaction by following the most advanced technology in the sector and using it on time, as well as working with a regular and qualified staff. Our team and employees who embrace team spirit and work with dedication are the architects of our quality.
about_desc: Your trusted solution partner in the construction sector since 1992
about_text_1: Erşah Construction was established in 1992 and is a company recognized for its many years of experience and expertise in the construction sector. The company has a proven track record of constructing high-quality buildings in residential, commercial and industrial projects. Erşah Construction aims to keep customer satisfaction at the highest level and attaches great importance to completing its projects on time and within budget.
about_text_2: Erşah Construction attaches great importance to sustainability and environmentally friendly practices. The company focuses on building energy-efficient and environmentally sensitive structures using modern construction techniques. It also adopts a meticulous approach to occupational safety and employee health, which ensures a safe working environment at every stage of its projects.
activities_desc: We provide quality service in different sectors with our expert staff
activities_text_preview_1: Our facilities equipped with the latest technology in health tourism...
activities_text_full_1: We offer modern treatment methods in a comfortable environment with our facilities equipped with the latest technology in health tourism and our expert staff. We provide full equipment for healthcare institutions and hospitals, supply and install medical devices, organize health tourism activities and provide medical consultancy services.
activities_text_preview_2: In the rapidly developing world, we provide the healthcare sector with the service required by the age...
activities_text_full_2: In the rapidly developing world, we provide the healthcare sector with the service required by the age. By using modern medical technologies, we provide patients with the best treatment opportunities, while also taking a leading position in health tourism and serving international patients.
activities_text_preview_3: Our projects designed with modern architectural understanding, quality material usage...
activities_text_full_3: Our projects designed with modern architectural understanding are brought to life with quality material usage and our experienced team. We provide services in a wide range from residential and commercial building construction to architectural design and planning, from project management and consultancy to restoration and renovation works.
activities_text_preview_4: In the construction sector, we maximize customer satisfaction with innovative approaches...
activities_text_full_4: In the construction sector, we maximize customer satisfaction with innovative approaches. By completing our projects on time and within budget, we build reliable and sustainable structures. With the importance we attach to occupational safety and environmentally friendly practices, we make a difference in the sector.
hr_policy_text: As Ersah Construction, the main objective of our human resources policy is to recruit quality human resources that will ensure the most efficient realization of company activities and to maintain the continuity of success; ensuring employee motivation, continuously improving the financial and social rights of employees, creating a fair and professional working environment, and providing the necessary support for identifying and addressing the training needs of personnel.

principle_7: Working environment based on love and respect,
principle_8: Being a company that is sensitive and respectful to society's beliefs and fundamental values.
